paras.paraDetail: Our premier real estate property portal and mobile app boasts a thriving community of over 142,000 members. Join us for a seamless real estate experience.

o Multiple Layouts: Choose the layout that suits your needs.
o Bookmark Properties: Keep track of your favorite properties.
o Direct Agent Engagement: Communicate directly with agents.
o Customizable Fields: Tailor your listings with granular details.
o Manage your ads, view payment summaries, and control your listings from your personalized dashboard.
o Promote your listings effectively by opting for top ads, featured placements, and more.

With Homlisti, each one of your users can create their own separate stores. They can add big banners with business descriptions and the opening and closing times of the Agency page. This gives the visitors all the information and ads from the store straightforwardly.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How do I post an ad?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: You can easily post your ad; Just tap on the the plus (+) icon & then login and submit your ad with proper data. You will get a notification after submitting your ad.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How do I edit/delete my ads?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Simply login and go to Account => my listing & you will get a list of your ads. Each ad has delete option

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How to edit my ad?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Simply login and go to Account => my listing & you will get a list of your ads. Each ad has edit option

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How many days my ads will remain active?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: It depends on your settings how many days the listing will active depends on it ads will be visible

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How many ads can I post for free?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: It depends on your settings on website seller will get no of free ads to post for certain no of days.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How can I edit my account information?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Login then go to my account, you will get your account information edit option

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: How to start chat with someone?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Go to detail of an ad; you will get email, phone and chat option. Just tap the chat icon and start your conversation.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.question: Will I get chat notifications as a Seller?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.answer: Yes. For chat request or email, seller will get an email notification. For chat, buyer will get first initial message as email notification.

sellFastTips.title: Pick the right price
sellFastTips.detail: Price is a big factor for customer who purchase the item. So before setting the price visit similar ads and set a reasonable and competitive price.

sellFastTips.title: Use great photos
sellFastTips.detail: Use clear & actual photos of your product/products. You can use multiple images from different view so buyer will get more clear idea about your item/items.

sellFastTips.title: Provide clear description
sellFastTips.detail: Provide clear and detail description of your product. Make sure you've added right information about your items.

paras.paraDetail: Welcome to srhousein.com, a classified platform dedicated to facilitating the buying and selling of products. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and mobile applications. By accessing or using srhousein.com, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

a. Personal Information: - When registering on srhousein.com or through our mobile applications, we collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number. - To enhance your experience on our platform, we may also request additional information such as your location, profile picture, and other details.
b. Transaction Information: - To facilitate transactions between buyers and sellers, we collect information related to your listings, purchases, and sales.
c. Communication Data: - We store messages exchanged through our internal messaging service on both the website and mobile applications to enable communication between users.

a. Providing Services: - We use your personal information to facilitate transactions, process payments, and provide customer support.
b. Communication: - Your contact information is used to communicate with you regarding your account, transactions, and promotions.
c. Improving Services: - We analyze user data from both the website and mobile applications to enhance and customize our services, improving user experience on srhousein.com.
d. Security: - Your information is crucial for the security of our platform on both the website and mobile applications. We employ measures to protect against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of your personal information.

a. Internal Sharing: - Certain information may be shared internally to provide and improve our services.
b. Third-Party Service Providers: - We may engage third-party service providers to assist with various aspects of our services, such as payment processing and data analysis.
c. Legal Compliance: - We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to legal requests.

a. Account Information: - You can review and update your account information at any time by logging into your account on srhousein.com or our mobile applications.
b. Communication Preferences: - You can manage your communication preferences by adjusting your notification settings.
a. We implement security measures to protect your personal information; however, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is entirely secure.
a. We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices and services. We will notify you of any significant changes.
a. If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [contact@srhousein.com].

termsAndConditions.paraData: These terms and conditions ('Terms') govern your use of the Srhousein website and Android application ('Platform'). By accessing or using the Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using the Platform.
Users must be at least 18 years old to use the Platform. By accessing and using the Platform, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.

To use certain features of the Platform, you may be required to create an account. You are responsible for providing accurate and up-to-date information during the registration process.
You must keep your account credentials, such as username and password, confidential and not share them with others.
You are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

You agree to use the Platform for lawful purposes only and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.
You must not engage in any conduct that may harm or interfere with the Platform's functionality, security, or integrity.

As a seller, you represent and warrant that you have the right to sell the items listed on the Platform.
You agree not to list any prohibited or illegal items, including counterfeit or stolen goods.
Srhousein reserves the right to remove any listings that violate these Terms or are deemed inappropriate.

Buyers agree to provide accurate and valid information for successful transactions.Srhousein does not guarantee the availability or condition of the items listed. Buyers are encouraged to review item descriptions and communicate with sellers before making a purchase

The Platform and its content, including but not limited to logos, text, graphics, and images, are the property of Srhousein and protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.
Users may not use, copy, reproduce, or distribute any content from the Platform without prior written consent from Srhousein.
Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
Srhousein reserves the right to terminate or suspend any user account at its sole discretion, without prior notice, for any violation of these Terms or any other reason deemed appropriate.

The Platform is provided on an 'as is' basis, and Srhousein makes no warranties or representations regarding its functionality, accuracy, or reliability.
Srhousein disclaims all warranties, whether express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
Srhousein shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Platform or any transactions conducted through it.
Srhousein reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time without prior notice. Changes will be effective upon posting on the Platform.

These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of [Your Jurisdiction]. Any dispute arising from or related to these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in [Your Jurisdiction].

By using the Srhousein Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please refrain from using the Platform.
